detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SKTCloudToken.sol#5)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SKTCloudToken.sol#16-18)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SKTCloudToken.sol#6)
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SKTCloudToken.sol#19-25)

	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SKTCloudToken.sol#26-31)
